body: Well, Not my cup of tea I guess. It killed the boner I had. What's with the obsession of cucks nowadays? Someone recommend me one manga where cuck man and women have their cock and tits cut off as revenge. I can fap to that. I like guro stuff, it's better if it has a purpose.

I find japanese NTR stories really boring now, they hurted me in the past but now I can see it's always the same schematic so it make me nothing (exept for this one: https://nhentai.net/g/257402/, my hugest trauma). Korean webcomics who turn into NTR are worse (or better), I had started reading Sex Lessons (1MC, 2 heroines. 1 is his GF the other his childhood friend) in English until chapter 28 and I liked it, it was more like "vanilla"than something else. Then I looked at the others chapters (raw) and the two heroines will fuck the boss of the MC... My heart broke.
Good ideas but not so well exploited : Training phase are way to fast & girls fall down so quickly ... :-( ...
Exterminate the self inserting insecure cucks.
@joontzu The vanilla trash in your favorites is all a waste of skills and time, so go back and fap to that shit you self inserting insecure cuck.

I really hate and despise stories like these. Imo waste of this artists skills and time.
Fuck all cucks.
